answers.answer: I can't wait either ,even my son keeps asking lol I have 47 days but she might be coming early also BC of high blood pressure and my baby is small also good luck all!

question: So, i have 37 days to go!!!! I'm just so excited to meet my little boy, and now i've finished work and am on maternity leave, and it feels like the end is finally near. I am just enjoying my free quiet time now, pottering around the house getting everything ready before i am busy with my new baby. I am due April 11, but due to bub measuring a bit small and me having gestational diabetes it could be earlier. Just had to share my excitement with all the other April mummies!!
title: Just excited!!
